name: Boxel Worms
description:
Boxel Worms is the most fun and addicting Worm Game ever, in 3D! Customize your Boxel Worm with personalized Eyes, Facewear, Mouths, Skins, Hair, and Colors. Earn coins to weaponize, dress, and defend your worm. Eat and get bigger. Become the best Boxel Worm player and win prizes! Tournaments, Survivor, mass multiplayer, Engaging & fun 3D maps, hidden tunnels, jumps, anti-gravity, Boxel Worms flying in the sky, and more.

Enjoy filtered family friendly chat, full 3D camera pivot control, beautiful Boxel Worm twists, rolls, & Spins. Take mini videos to share your epic Boxel Worm matches, size, and gear with friends.

We are now letting anyone play for free while we are in BETA mode, so come join us today (click on links below)...

For discussions, helps, feedback, and to interact with other Boxel fans and member, join us on our family friendly forum.
